phrases: TL Note: Uchida Hyakken (Real name Uchida Eizo) was a Japanese author who wrote many novels, one of them being I am a Cat: The Fake Version.
TL Note: This is a pun on the words for rhyming for these three lines: JERASHII , kurushii and urayamashii
I am relieved to say that the dormitory I am staying in at Youkai Academy has single-rooms.
Hey, you transformed while you were sleeping.
Oh crap, that is against the school rules is not it...
But hey, is not it the same for you?
Yes, this is a school built and designed by monsters, for monsters to attend.
I have to wait a month for the bus to come back and return me back to my world
Until then, I cannot let anyone know that I am actually human.
Look, it is the lengendary new student, Akayashi Moka-chan.
It is that Aono Tsukune guy!
He might not look like it, but he carries the power to defeat that delinquent monster, Komiya Saizou!
Okay, okay, okay, thanks for the explanation chuu.
Since when did I defeat him?
I think it must be lonely for you to be in a school full of monsters,
But if something is troubling you, please come and tell me.
I will do my best to help you.
Even though it scared me when she suddenly turned into a vampire,
Moka-san is really friendly, after all.
I overslept and have not had my breakfast, so...
There is no wound, and it does not hurt that much, but...
but Moka-san is a vampire after all.
If that scary Moka-san was her true nature...
What am I doing in such a scary school!
I am sorry, but could you give me a hand?
Anyways, I have to take you to the infirmary.
When I smell Tsukune's blood, I cannot resist at all.
At any rate, I have to apologise!
Wait, how did you know my name?
Geez, are not we in the same class?
Although she is a cute girl,
but she is a monster too, right?
I have been weak ever since I was born.
Squeeze just like this, like it is about to burst!
She is a monster, but even monsters feel great!
And it is bouncing and squeezing...
That is right, it does not matter if they are a monster or human.
That is weird, my body is moving on it is own...
My, are not we in the same class?
No, I will not wait for you.
Because Moka-san will treat me as her breakfast.
Why did I say those things to Moka-san?
Let us get going, before you get eaten.
Among famous novelists who are cat lovers,
He was a pupil of Natsume Souseki...
Everything Teacher Nekonome is saying refers to modern literature.
What is her relationship with Tsukune?
Why did I say those things back then?
I need to talk Moka-san later.
My, it looks like it is time.
Then we will end here today.
Geez, he is gone head over heels for her.
That is one of the rumors,
There is that, but the most important is those bouncing breasts!
Her body is so small, yet why are her breasts are so big?
It must be from the lineage of'milky way' breasts!
I came here to challenge you.
You are in the way of my grand plan.
Yes, to turn all of Youkai Academy's boys into my love slaves.
The Youkai Academy Harem Transformation Plan!
This is the succubus Kuruno Kurumu's flawless plan!
Is not it against school rules to reveal your true identity?
Instead of falling for me, all the boys are falling for you instead.
You guys, this conversation is off topic.
My charms should not have lost to you!
It is going to be a big storm!
That is why I have decided to steal Aono Tsukune from you, and defeat you completely!
This has nothing to do with Tsukune!
I was searching for you, Moka-san.
It is going to rain blood.
Sorry, but I need to talk to Moka-san.
There was not anything to talk about...
This must be why you were having him for breakfast.
I am not using him or anything, I just...
That is why Moka-san wanted to befriend me.
Why am I saying things I do not mean?
Seems like I really am just breakfast for Moka-san.
Yay, I made that wench cry!
Why did I say such terrible things to Moka-san?
Moka-san's tearful face is just priceless!
No matter how I think about it, I said too much.
I have to apologise to Moka-san.
You must be feeling depressed, Tsukune-kun.
It would be too dangerous to broadcast the following scenes chuu.
Do I really just want Tsukune's blood?
I do not even know what is what anymore.
Is this the time to be depressed?
Tsukune is only enchanted by that succubus' lure,
It is called Charm, and he is merely being controlled by it.
Those who receive the succubus' kiss will be subservient,
and their energy will be sucked from them until they die.
You will be the first one I have tried this ability on.
I said such terrible things to Moka-san just now, and also...
I even did something like this!
I even did such embarassing things to get you!
I will destroy everything that is related to that woman!
Do not lay a finger on Tsukune!
Take this chance to escape, Tsukune!
You came to save me, Moka-san?
That person's true form is a Succubus.
Her gaze has the power to enslave men.
Then, those terrible things I said to you...
I will just kill both of you together.
Please, take the rosary on my chest off quickly.
It did come off the other time...
The rumour of you being a vampire is only to trick guys, right?
You two can die in each others arms!
Spare him and kill me instead!
You are still trying to protect your precious food, Akashiya Moka!?
It is not that I want his blood!
I do not want to lose him!
Because he is my first precious friend!
They are meant to submit to you!
Even me, even if it is me, I am still Moka-san's friend!
How can I become a burden to her!?
Once the rosary on her chest is removed,
The blood of the Vampire hidden within Moka will awaken.
This is the extremely rare S-class super monster.
Is this the true form of vampires?
Whether the rumours are true or not,
Will be determined with your own body, little succubus.
Do not joke with me, I will not lose!
I shoulder an important mission to ensure my race's future.
We Succubi seek our destined partner by enslaving men.
So, to ensure we do not become extinct,
We have to choose our Destined One from a large number of men.
You, Akashiya Moka, who hinder me...
I will never forgive you no matter what!
That is why you bear your fangs at me?
This week's fight lasted for 76 seconds chuu.
You are an especially unpleasant sight.
I will snap those wings and tail so that you will not ever fly again.
What do you think you are doing?
Not only did you get tricked by that woman, she almost killed you too.
Kurumu-san did not have any malicious intentions.
Because, Kurumu-san does not look in the least like a bad girl.
I just do not want anyone else to snatch your blood away,
Moka-san is a precious friend, no matter which one.
That is why giving you a little blood is not a problem for me.
Stop gazing at each other so much chuu!
I baked some cute cookies for you!
If you want, we can eat them together!
Seriously, did not I mention I was looking for my Destined One?
Did not you risk yourself to protect me, Tsukune?
I have an appearance next week too!
Next week introduces a new character!
